title: 108_s1004
content: Healthy Children Learn Act - Amends the Head Start Act to authorize early Head Start and Head Start programs to carry out asthma, vision, and hearing screening programs. Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary Of Health and Human Services to award grants to local educational agencies for asthma, vision, hearing, and other health screening programs for public school children. States that nothing under any law relating to a program that provides health benefits coverage for children and including the payment limitation known as the free care rule shall be construed as prohibiting or restricting assistance for children receiving asthma, vision, hearing, or other health screening tests.
